1.content:
It was 8:00 at night when I walked up to Calloway's Military school, it was gloomy as i was walking up the hill. I eventually came to a brick building surrounded by a metal fence as i sighed
"So this is hell" I thought to myself thinking of the fate that awaited me inside this pristine building as i closed my eyes
"I would rather be anywhere then here" I thought standing silent as i decided to push the buzzer. I'm already in the Dragon's den i might as well get on their good side" I thought as a voice interrupted the silence coming thru a intercom
"Yes" a voice responded, sound like it belonged to a man
"Are you Col. Calloway?" I asked felling as thou he was and i just asked a stupid question
"Yes, what i can i do for you?" The voice said impatient
"I should be enrolled here" I said as i heard a distance sound of papers rustling
"I'm not expecting anymore students, what's your name" the Col. said feeling i was wasting his time as i gave him my name
"Ah ha, you not enrolled here" The col. said as i smiled
"really, I could've sworn my parents filled out a form" I replied confused but not questioning a get out of jail free card
"They did, but not here, according to the mainframe you're enrolled at Grimwoods" The Col. said confused
"Is there something wrong about that?" I asked after hearing him
"Well it's an 'all girl' school for monsters" The Col. responded as i stood still hoping he was joking
"Well I'm a human and a boy so what do i do?" I asked confused as the Col. responded
"Maybe Talk to Miss Grimwood, maybe she can help straighten things out, her school is just uphill" The Col. responded shutting off the intercom as i froze in fear seeing the decaying building up the hill, it looked like something out of an old horror movie
"Yeah I'll do that" I thought to myself as i walked to a street corner sitting down for a good 30 minutes thinking about what to do. I eventually decided to check the Grimwood school out, The Col. was probably just trying to scare me, like a joke on the new kid i mean monsters are fake, i don't know what was holding me back but i eventually made my way to the school. i eventually saw a woman working in he garden as i checked my watch, i was 9:30 who would be up at this time. I walked to the woman nervous
"Excuse me" I stuttered as the woman turned around she was old hunchbacked and wrinkled looking like a witch
"Yes" the old woman replied happily tending her garden pulling out plants
"Are you Miss Grimwood" I asked as the woman took her gloves off
"Why yes I am, what could i do for you?" She asked politely
"I was supposed to be going to Calloway's military school, but when i got there he said my application went here,probably by mistake" I stated confused
"Yes, The human boy I heard about that, I knew your application sounded off, but i already accepted it" The woman said as a giant spider rolled the wheelbarrow to a shed
"So that mean that...i really am...enrolled here?" I asked confused
"Yes Mr, oh what you're name" she asked as i remembered i never told her
1.title: The Arrivial

13.content:
"Well Carl, I hope you will enjoy your stay here, as you could've guessed you're the first male student we've ever had" Miss Grimwood said walking inside the school as i followed her setting my bag down inside the main room
"So, are there any other students?" I asked seeing no one as Miss Grimwood chuckled
"Of course in fact there's one right behind you" the elderly woman said as turned around seeing a figure protruding from the wall, as coiled in fear
"What the hell!" I quickly let out she had light blue skin and white hair and wearing a transparent garment, technically all of her was transparent
"Hi, My name's Phantasma" the girl stated as i stared awkwardly
"Is that the new kid?" a voice asked from upstairs as i heard quick tapping on the wooden floor above me as a canine-like creature ran down the stairs on all four legs as it stood up revealing it to be a girl coated entirely in fur, she had red-orange hair and wore a torn up blue dress quickly followed by other girls, there were 10 in total. there was also a purple skinned girl in a dark robe, one with excessive stitches in her wearing improvised clothes, one who looked coated in a body-cast,, and small and pink wearing a spacesuit, and covered in seaweed like material, two lizard girls, one who had spikes sticking from her back, black hair and wearing an orange dress and one as big as an adult in a pink dress. the last one who had blueish green skin and brown hair wearing camo jeans and a hooded jacket as i couldn't help but faint on the spot. I woke up later in a room adjusting as i was laying on an uncomfortable bed as i got up seeing a person in the doorway, he was the only other 'normal person' i've seen since i got here. He was wearing a red shirt and had two dogs with him, one a Great Dane with a few black spot and a collar, the other much younger walking on two legs
"Like good, you're finally up " The man said as i rubbed my head
"What happened to those girls" I asked confused about what i saw
"Oh the students, they're downstairs, and they're probably eager to meet you" The puppy said as i coiled back
"Did that puppy just talk?" I asked hoping i wasn't going crazy
"Yeah i did, Scrappy Doo is the name, and this is my Uncle Scooby and our friend Shaggy" Scrappy said in a qwerky tone
"Hello" Scooby said with an 'R' sound making it sound like 'Rello' as i rubbed my head
"Monster Kids and Talking Dogs, what's next?" I asked myself getting off the bed
"I might as well meet my new...classmates" I said walking downstairs hanging onto the railing still uneasy from he events, imagine just finding out monsters were real, and i'd be staying with 10 of them as I walked down the stairway i saw two of the monster girls
13.title: First Contact

132.content:
I noticed the furry girl and the spiked lizard girl on the stairs laughing at a joke one had said. the faces turn from amusement to seriousness upon noticing I was there
"Oh, it's you" the girl said trying to ignore me
"Nice to meet you too" I replied confused
"Winnie, introduce us" The lizard girl said nudging her shoulder as Winnie took a deep sigh
"I'm Winnie, and to answer your question, yes I am a werewolf, and this is Chika, she's a Chupacabra" The wolf girl replied heading upstairs
"I'll catch up Winnie,I'm gonna talk with the new kid" Chika said as Winnie was already upstairs
"What's her problem" I asked the young Chupacabra as the put her hand on my shoulder
"Don't let Winnie get to you like that, She's just uncomfortable around new kids especially boys" Chika replied
"Should I do something nice for her" I asked wanting to get on the wolf's good-side
"Just pay no attention to her, and she tolerate you" Chika said
"Do the others have similar feeling about having a human boy here" I asked feeling in a sunken ship and the girls were sharks waiting to chew me up and spit me out
"They all feel odd about it, myself included, but my Mami told me to "respect and tolerate others" Chika replied
"Good philosophy" I said in a remark
"Just cooperate with everyone they'll all warm up to you eventually, even Winnie" Chika said
"Why is Winnie so intolerant of boys" I asked trying to put pieces together
"She's not intolerant, just defensive, and she doesn't like to talk about it, so i have to respect her privacy there" Chika said
"Thanks Chika" I said as smiled
"I'm always here if you need something" Chika said as i continued going downstairs
"Oh and I really hope you stay" Chika said as i turned around. She just smiled and walked upstairs as i decided to just ignore Winnie for now, I could try befriending with other girls as i went to the den i saw two groups, but then again it was late maybe i should go to bed, i eventually decided to___
132.title: First Impression

1323.content:
It was already 11:00 at night so i decided to walk up to my room, There was always tomorrow to meet the girls. I made it to the room I was in before as it noticed it had a small 9 on a plague as I turned the rusted knob entering the room walking to the bed as i plopped on the mattress tired. Part of me thought I was dreaming, i mean monsters and talking dogs. I laid on the bed not even bothering to get undressed or get under the covers. A good hour an a half and i couldn't get to sleep, they were noises keeping me up, everything from trees blowing against the building to creaking boards to howling which i concluding was coming from Winnie. eventually the door to my room opened as the light turned on burning my eyes as my view just saw a pink and blue blob in front of me. My eyesight fixed as everything was clear I was looking at the alien girl as we were both surprised to see eachother
"What are you doing in my room" I asked her sleepy
"These are my quarters" The girl said confused
"These are my bags which the teachers brought up here" I replied as she pulled out a piece of paper
"The symbol on the lock matches this inscription Miss Grimwood gave me" She replied in defense
"Let me see" I asked as she handed me a metal key, the key had a 6 carved on it
"This is a 6, this lock says 9" I told her
"Meaning?" she replied confused
"This is not your room" I showed her turning the number upside-down explaining the earth number to her
"It was a simple miscalculation" the girl responded
"There a line under the 6, just remember line at the bottom" I said as she smiled
"Thanks.. uh what's your name?" the girl asked wanting to know
"Carl" I reponded still sleepy
"my identification is Mary" The girl responded
"Mary, that doesn't sound like an alien name" I said confused
"My true identification is unpronounceable in Earth languages"Mary said leaving the room as I got up
"I should probably lock my door, i said noticing a key on the night stand with a nine carved in it
"We must have keys to lock our rooms"i concluded as i walked to the door turning the lock as i eventually went to sleep
1323.title: Room 6...Or is it a 9

13231.content:
I woke up around 9:00 in the morning as i got off the bed yawning. I figured i might as well unlock the door as i walked down the hall,I obviously had to pee, i don't what it is about some people having to to use the bathroom first thing in the morning but i figured i wasn't the only one, i spotted Chika coming out of what i assumed was the bathroom adjusting her dress
"Is this the bathroom?" I asked as she smiled nodding
"Help yourself" she responded leaving as i entered the room locking the door as I made my way to the toilet noting the seat already up but just shrugging it off as i unzipped my jeans as the sound of my stream bouncing against the bowl could be heard. i eventually finished as i flushed the toilet from a chain crank and put the seat down as i zipped up my pants leaving the bathroom as i headed back to my sleeping quarters deciding to make my bed. upon finishing i decided to unpack my stuff, first was my cherry red fender jazzmaster which i put in the corner, next my clothes which i put into the dresser there which was coated in dust as i pulled out my CD player, i decided if i was gonna clean up this room I might as well listen to some tunes as I popped a disk in and placed the thing on the dresser as i continued unpacking my stuff, container of hair gel, and knives, switchblade and butterfly, eventually i came to my prized possession, a pair of nunchakus, there were black mahogany held by a stainless steel chain, these weren't some cheap knockoffs you could find at the mall, these were high end, they were a gift from my Martial Arts teacher I've been taking martial arts for a few years and I recently got my black belt, I figured i could play with these for a while, I enjoyed freestyling with these bad boys as i twirled them around smoothly between my hands while listening to some progressive rock spinning and catching the chucks to the beats of the song as it climaxed i used the sticks drumming out the final part as the song concluded i swung the chuck catching the other end in my hand. I noticed a rusted nail sticking out of the wall over my bed as i swung the chucks there catching the nail with the chain pulling it out as i placed the chucks in my jacket pocket and sat the bed noticed Chika standing in the doorway with another girls, one coated in seaweed.
"How long were you three standing there?" I asked taking the disk out of the CD player
" Good while the swamp girl said
"And you are?" I asked implying her to introduce herself
"Oh, My name is Goonie" The girl said introducing herself
"Nice to meet you" I said shaking her hand
"I came to tell you breakfast was ready" Chika said as i smiled
"Great I could eat a horse" I replied jokingly
13231.title: Nunchakus

132312.content:
I Won't bother going into breakfast, It was a nasty meal that I couldn't eat, eventually Mr. Rogers gave me some of the sandwich him and the Dogs were making. Eventually all of the girls introduced themselves, not only was i going to the wrong school, not only was it an 'all girl school, not only was it a school for monster but these girls were the kids of some of the deadliest monster I've heard about, i suddenly prayed i don't do anything the piss the girls off. Gym class started and we decided to jog , Winnie easily took the lead making sense being part animal, she was easily the fastest of the girls. The young werewolf was followed by Jessica, I guess growing up outside made her really fast and fit. Sibella, then Phanty caught up to them, I was assuming their powers wouldn't help with running. Chika was just in front of me, I thought she would be faster, but i guess all my accusation were not right Goonie was Barely behind me, maybe she was just trying to not get tangled in the seaweed which coated her body, the same probably for Tanis being coated in bandages. Mary was close to last, but i guess it wasn't her fault, due to adjusting to earth's gravity. Zina and Elsa, were closely tied for last I guess Zina's size weighed her down and Elsa couldn't run due to her inability to bend her knees. eventually the jog was over and everyone was stretching in the schoolyard. I felt this might be a good time to talk to Winnie, she appeared to be boasting to the other new students. Later i walked up to her and Chika, I realized no other girls were around and the two were extremely close friends
"Nice job out there i said to both girls as Chika smiled saying thanks as Winnie just stood still nodding
"Winnie I had no idea you were so fast" I said wiping the sweat off my forehead
"Thanks" she replied with no emotion implying she didn't want me around
"Oh Carl, Me and Winnie were going out to go swimming in the lake, I would really like for you to come" Chika said pouring a bottle of water on her head to cool off
"I Think I have some trunks in my bag" I responded
"Wait, What!" Winnie said annoyed
"What?" Chika replied confused
"Are you seriously asking this boy to go swimming with us!" Winnie sated in an outburst
"Winnie, It won't hurt to invite him" Chika replied
"I don't want to hang out with him!" Winnie replied
"Winnie you can't keep avoiding him all year" Chika stated
"It's Ok, I could pass" I said hoping to end the argument
"Look Winnie, I just want the three of us to spend some time together" Chika told Winnie
"Chika, I really don't mind passing out" I stated
"See Chika even he doesn't mind not swimming" Winnie said using my words against her
"Because You're being a bitch!" Chika responded
"Excuse me!" Winnie shouted pissed off
"Sorry, bad choice of words, my fault" Chika replied taking back what she said as she hummed a faint melody which calmed Winnie down
"Look Winnie, I just want you to learn to tolerate Carl, You don't have to go and be his best friend" Chika said softly
"Ok Chika, I'll Try" Winnie said as Chika hugged her
"Thank you" Chika replied as Winnie went to school to get her swimsuit leaving me and the Chupacabra alone
"What was with that humming?" I asked confused as to how easily she sedated Winnie's temper
"It's a nursery our mothers sang to us when we were little" Chika responded
"How long have you two known eachother?" I asked confused about their friendship
"Since we were toddlers, our fathers are close friends and every year Winnie's family comes down the Mexico for the summer, This is my first year at Grimwoods," Chika stated
"We I'll get my trunks" Carl said walking with Chika to the school as we went our separate ways
132312.title: Heated Exercise

1323122.content:
I walked back to the school to get my swimsuit, I really do need to get Winnie to learn to tolerate Carl. I eventually made it to my bedroom, which I shared with Winnie, The school only has 10 student bedroom so two girls had to bunk, and being so close it was decided I would be Winnie's roommate. I placed my key into the lock of the door turned as i wiggled the knob entering. Winnie was changing into her swimwear as I smiled to her putting on her blue one-piece bathing suit
"Chika does this show too much skin?" Winnie asked concerned about being around Carl
"Winnie, you're covered in fur I Can't see any, besides your hands and feet" I told her as smiled
"Oh yeah" Winnie said in a happier joking mood as i pulled the back of her swimsuit letting it snap against her behind
Don't do that in front of Carl" Winnie said half teasing half serious
"Winnie, I don't even think Carl's that interested in you, he's just being nice" I told her
"Wait, are you interested in him?" Winnie asked as my face turned red
"What me, nah" I shrugged off as Winnie smelt me
"Yes you are, you're bluffing" Winnie pointed out
"Ok Fine, Yes I like him" I replied
"Do you think he likes you?" Winnie asked putting her hand on my shoulder
"Maybe I don't know" I replied as Winnie put her hand on her leg
"Do you think he would like you if he knew your little secret" Winnie replied teasing as i blushed
"Wait Winnie, You're not gonna tell him That are you?" I pleaded
"Me, never, you're my best friend, I'm just saying you can't hide it forever, and 'eventually' he will find out" Winnie said vitrifying she would keep my secret as i sighed in relief getting undressed as i changed into my swimsuit, an orange two piece with a skirt as we went to the lake
1323122.title: Chika's Secret

13231222.content:
I couldn't seem to find my trunks, but i decided I might as well head to lake, i could still have a conversation with the girl. I left the school and walked down a dirt path eventually finding the body of water. I arrived at the lake wearing my shirt, pants and coat as i walked to to the area which unlike most areas was actually clean, the water was a sparkly blue as i sat down on the grass i guess the others were here yet but i shrugged it off laying down as a took a deep breath sitting down. I ran my finger thru a bushel of clovers grabbing a bundle as I looked at them all before tossing them on the ground. I found some stones near the edge of the pond picking them up, they were all smooth and thin as i swung my hand skipping a stone as it bounced off the water. After I ran out of stones i just laid down waiting for the two girls, i was beginning to think they weren't coming. I eventually dozed out only to be woken by an arm on my shoulder. a turned looking at my watch, i was out for 30 minutes. I looked at the girls in their swimwear. Chika was blushing at the fact I was staring at her, Winnie was pretty much the opposite giving me a sour look. Both girls entered the lake
"Hey Carl, Why aren't you wearing your swimwear" Chika asked swimming up to me
"I couldn't find them" I responded as she accepted the answer as the moment went by smoothly as i got up to take a piss.When I got back four boys had arrived at the lake, I stayed out of sight but I could tell Winnie was annoyed from my view
"Hey get out of our spot" One of the boys said , he was Hispanic and wore trunks
"Make me" Winnie said
"Miguel, I think they have just as much right as we do" One of the boys said
"No we own rights to this spot, were not gonna ask again" the other boy said who was the biggest
"If Winnie said she's not moving, she's not moving" Chika replied
"Oh, you must be new, what's you're name?" The tall kid asked
"Chika" the lizard replied
"And Chika, I assuming your a Grimwood Ghoul, what are you a... let me guess a dragon hybrid type" the tall kid said
"Dragon my ass, that bitch is El Chupacabra" Miguel said
"actually yes, I'm surprised" Chika said
"How did you know" The big kid asked
"Her kind are from Mexican folklore" Miguel said
"Either way These girls have to leave Grunt said as Winnie walked up to him
"And if we don't" Winnie said as Grunt punched her as she fell down as everyone, including the other Cadets just stood shocked,
"Grunt, No need need to be Violent" Miguel said the big kid ignored him and continued the beating Part of we wanted to go out there and fight that bully but on the other hand this girl pretty much hated me, and i part of me enjoyed watching her get beat up, but i didn't have to get physically involved, i could let Winnie get trashed then report it to the teachers i was at an emotional crossroad but eventually i decided to
13231222.title: Bully

132312221.content:
I didn't know what to do but I couldn't just let the girls get mutilated and I grew tired of watch Winnie getting slammed as I walked out into the open concluding she's been through enough
"What's going on?" I asked walking to the kids as they turned looking at me as they walked away from Winnie, The girl had a bloody nose and a few bruises
"Back off, This is a Calloway and Grimwood issue" Grunt said
"Yeah, and I haven't seen you on the ground so I doubt you're with us" Miguel said
"That's right" I responded trying to avoid any confict
"Then what's the deal" Grunt asked
"The deal is she's my classmate" i responded as they broke out chuckling
"Your'e...enrolled at Grimwoods" Grunt laughed but I was unaffected by their amusement
"How old are you big guy 18?" I asked guessing by his size
"17, your point? He asked
"Do you feel good, about beating up a girl half your age?" I asked him
"Girl, you say that like she's a human" Grunt replied
"let's get one thing clear Lard-tub, if i catch you beating on her or any of her classmates I'll wipe that smile off your face
"Lard-tub, I'm not fat idiot i'm big-boned" Grunt replied
"That's what she said" Jamal said making it into a joke
"Now That Is Funny" the other kids said
"Shut up Freddy" Grunt said as the new kid shut his mouth
"Chika, Winnie, you two get out of here, things might get messy" I said as she nodded as she and Winnie ran off.
Winnie and Chika ran out off eye sight and hearing range as Winnie stopped
"Winnie what is it" Chika asked confused
"I Want to watch this" Winnie replied excited
"Why" Chika said
"Because Those 'boys' are fighting each-other, so no matter who gets beat up, it's a win" Winnie said smiling
"Winnie, Carl just stood up to that big kid for you, show some gratitude he's on our side" Chika said
"Well I'm watching this fight" Winnie said being stern
"Suit Yourself, I'm going back to the school, to tell the others" Chika said as Winnie grabbed her
"Please Chika, don't tell anyone" Winnie said
"Because...?" Chika asked for a reason confused
"I don't want everyone knowing I got beat up by a human boy" Winnie responded
"It's nothing to be ashamed of" Chika replied
"It is to me" Winnie pleaded wiping the blood off her nose
"Then what I say about your present condition?" Chika asked
"You're Smart, you'll think of something" Winnie groaned as Chika smiled
"That Typical Winnie, To proud of yourself" Chika said running back
132312221.title: Get Things Clear

1323122211.content:
I went back to the lake and sat behind a bush, I wanted to be far enough so Those boys wouldn't see me, but close enough to watch the simpletons beat each other. I know most people would probably think I'm being mean to Carl, But i learn from experience, and i can't help but feel this boy is trouble. I eventually walked over to the perfect spot as a sat down, the seat off my wet swimsuit stuck to the dirt as i watched the event
"Look Kid, we're the human boys, you should be on our side" Grunt said as Carl just looked at him
"So is that why you hate them for being monster girls, that's no different then being racist" Carl responded
"I am Not racist, I have friends of various skin color" Grunt said
"So You're sexist then" Carl said which i couldn't agree more with to describe the Cadets, If It had to be one word it would be Bigot
"I am not sexist either, if they were human they would be fine to be around" Grunt said as i nearly threw up at what he said, like I could change my species just like that
"Grunt I think we should just leave" Miguel said
"I'm not leaving" Grunt said
"For the record, not all of us, share Grunt's view" Frederick said
"Look are you gonna leave or do i have to make you" Carl said as i rubbed my hands together hoping to finally see some action as Grunt cracked his knuckles
"If you challenge me will not end will" Carl said as i was eager to see these boys tear each other up as Grunt swung his fist land a blow up Carl's chest as he recoiled hitting an hard object in the coat.
"Ow what the hell" Grunt said as Carl pulled something from his coat, i could identify the object until he started swinging it
"Holy Christ" Miguel stated
"Where did you get nunchucks" Jamal asked
"I'm a Martial Arts student, Black Belt to be precise" Carl said as my eyes widened, this just got interesting. Carl swung his ninja sticks around as I watched the stick twirling in awe as he laid blows on Grunt as the fight broke out, this went from being amusing to being arousing and exciting, as with each move i was watching in amazment, and I found myself cheering for Carl, silently. Carl swung the chucks catching the other end as the lard-ass fell to the ground
"No more" Grunt pleaded as Carl sheathed the chucks in his coat
" You promise to not be any trouble" Carl said
"I Promise" Grunt said
"And Not beating on the girls" Carl said
"I Promise" Grunt repeated getting up backing away as the other cadets quickly followed as I realized the fight was over I should probably get back to the school but then again I could talk to Carl
1323122211.title: Watching in the Bushes

13231222111.content:
I high tailed it back to the school confident that Carl wouldn't get there before me. I made it there my swimsuit was still damp, i couldn't tell if it was from the water or if it was sweat but I entered the building where I saw Tanis, Goonie and Mary sitting on the stairs as they looked at me noticing my injury
"Winnie, your nose is bleeding" Tanis said in disgust as I ran my hand across the area, my fur had red stains
"Oh, I uh Fell climbing a tree" I made up feeling embarrassed about what happened
"That's not what Chika told me" Goonie said sliding down a few stairs
"What did she tell you?" I asked wanting to know what she said
"She told me that you tripped and fell on a rock" Goonie stated
"Yes, I was tee climbing and tripped off and fell on a rock" I sighed as Mary pulled a weird device from her belt as it shined a light on my face
"Mary what was that for" I asked closing my eyes to block the brightness
"Healing Ray" Mary stated as i rolled my eyes going upstairs to my room. I looked at the mirror in my room to notice my nose looked untouched, even the bloodstains were gone. I pulled my arms thru the armstraps of my swimsuit sliding in off as i threw it down the hamper and sat on my bed, the sun was still up, as i just laid on my bed staring at the ceiling, the light was shining the a window lighting a corner of the room. the quiet was interfered by the door opening
"Winnie, you in here? I heard as I looked up seeing Carl in my doorway immediately covering myself with the bedsheets as he covered his eyes
"Whoa" He said in shock
"Carl, could you knock first" I stated feeling both embarrassed and pissed, if he hadn't beaten up Grunt earlier i would've put my claws in him there and then
"Sorry, my fault but i didn't know you were undressed" Carl said as i stared at him
"What do you want?" I asked him still with attitude
"I just wanted to check on you" He said as i calmed down
"I'm fine, now leave" i said as he shrugged his shoulders
"If it makes you feel any better, i didn't see anything" He said
"Out" I quietly whispered not wanting to cause a scene as he closed the door. I will give that kid credit for beating up a cadet but that still doesn't change anything between me and him. i scooted the sheets to the side realizing i should get dressed as i reached for my clothes pulling my blue dress over my head as it fell covering my body as i reached for the drawer pulling out a clean pair of underwear sliding it up and wrapped a light bow around the dress to put on the finishing touches.
13231222111.title: Knock First

132312221112.content:
I walked outside of the school deciding to do a slow lap around the school as i stared my walk it was 4 in the afternoon as the smell of grass filled the area as i hummed exiting view of the school. I was wondering how after doing something as selfless as standing up to Grunt for Winnie, she didn't even acknowledge my kind act, maybe i should've just let that boy tear her a new hole. I later decided I did make the right choice as I continued walking I eventually saw the boys from earlier on the path as they walked to me
"You Grimwood boy, Tug Roped has requested you to see him" Miguel said
"Who is Tug Roper?" I asked feeling like they think I should be scared
"He's head cadet, trust me, you want to be on his good side, we're not going to resort to violence but please see him" Jamal said
"This could be an attempt to ambush me" I replied in defense
"We just want you to her him out, we're sorry for Grunt's behavior, we've never hit any of the girls before" Jamal
"Yeah I'm sorry, I was just angry and confused, I've never seen Winnie befriend a boy" Grunt said
"What Winnie, she's not my friend" I said which was true
"just Talk to Tug" Miguel said putting his hand on my back
"OK" I said interested in what they had to say
"Give Jamal Williams your nunchucks, to make sure you don't try anything" Miguel said as I reluctantly handed him the chucks, but I wanted to show a good example as they escorted me on a side path to an old decrepit house. there was a blond haired kid sitting on the porch eating from a bag of beef jerky in font of a capfire,I figured him to be Tug
"You're the Grimwood Boy" the boy said as i nodded
"Tug Roper he said extending his hand for a handshake as i reluctantly shook it
"Carl" I said introducing myself
"Look Carl the boys told me about the lake and I apologize for Grunt's violence, the Calloway code even states not to strike females, although your not a student we would like you on our side" Tug said offering me a piece of jerky as slowly took the piece
"This sounds nice but I'm enrolled at Grimwood and the girls might feel betrayed by me doing this" I said
"They don't have to know, but face it, they're monster girls, I don't want to sound rude but they will never really understand you" Tug said as i figured that sounded logical
"Plus by being our friend you won't betray the girls" Grunt said as i thought it over I decided to
132312221112.title: An Offer of Friendship

1323122211121.content:

"Well be here, pretended we don't know anything" Jamal said
"Why are we pranking them" I asked
"This isn't an actual prank, we need the girls as a test group for the attraction" tug said
"Well I guess, but we should pretend we knew nothing about this either, just tell them afterwards Freddy's cousin told him to check it out" I suggested
"OK you should probably head back to Grimwood's remember 7:00 tonight" Grunt said as I nodded
"I'm gonna have a hard time looting the other 9 girls" I told Tug
"Forget the Panties, do this you're one of us"Tug said as I smiled
"You could leave you could help us set up" Tug said
132312221112121111222211.title: Test Group

1323122211121211112222111.content:
i decided to head back to the school, I figured it would be better to be more surprised by what was in store, especially considering Rob Craven would be in on it, dude was a living legend in the horror scene. I eventually got back to the school around 5:00 in the afternoon. The Girls were playing some game in the yard as I walked up to them
"Hey where have you been Carl?" Goonie asked tossing a ball to Tanis
"I was walking in the woods and i overheard the Cadets talking about some haunted house" I told them as they dropped the ball picking up intrest after i said haunted house
"What kind of haunted house?" Tanis asked
"Is it on with shrieking hallways, those are my favorite" Phanty said
"or Two way mirrors" Sibella added
"Is it coated in cobwebs?" Elsa asked as all the girls were eager about it
"I don't know, I just heard the Cadet say they were meeting there around 7:00" I told them
"We have to check it out" Chika said ecstatically as the others agreed
"Hey Shaggy, you guys want to go to a haunted house?" Goonie asked the teachers who were in their van eating as usual
"Like no can do, we do not do haunted houses, every time me and Scoob go to a haunted house, we end up being chased by a spooky freak" Shaggy argued
"Yeah, chased by a spooky freak" Scooby added
"Come on Uncle Scooby, It'll be fun" Scrappy said
"No way" Scooby replied
"Well I'm going" Scrappy said getting out of the van
"Scooby,he's your nephew" Shaggy said and he and Scooby left the van as they joined the girls they all walked down the dirt path coming across the cadets
"It's the Ghouls" Baxter said
"What are you doing here?" Tug asked faking being suprised
"I overheard you talking about the house, he thought We'd check it out" I told him
"Ok Fine, but it's a tour, the girls have to be human or e can't go" Tug said as we all walked to the house, the girls changing into human form as he approached the house seeing an old man
"Are you the tour guide" Tug asked as the man replied
1323122211121211112222111.title: Haunted House

13231222111212111122221111.content:
The old man spit out a wad of chewing tobacco nodding
"yes, i'm the guide, Reverend Corpsy, but don't let my name fool you...i'm not associated with the church anymore" he old man said
"So you ARE giving tours of his old place?" Winnie asked in conformation
"Yeah, I'm a traveling guide, Give tour of the most haunted places on earth, Last month I gave a tour of the Gettysburg battlefield, and the week before the West Ridge Asylum, here take some pamphlets" Corpsy said handing out a bunch of old pamphlets as the kids looked thru them
"You give tours of Crystal Lake" Jessica said nervously
"I don't do the Crystal Lake tour anymore, I'm not allowed" Corpsy said
"Why" I asked confused as Corpsy looked at me
"It was 3 years ago i was driving a tour-boat on the lake, there was a boy, about his age" Corpsy said pointing to Baxter
"What happened?" Baxer asked
"It was dark, he moonlight illuminated the sky, he boys looked out towards the old campsite, he pointed a campfire in the distance, we all looked and saw what made no sense" Corpsy said
"A campfire at an old Campsite, how does that make no sense?" Tug said as Jessica interrupted
"Because after the string of murders the campsite was banned from the public, It's Illegal to be there" Jessica stated
"So he was giving an Illegal tour?" I asked
"No!, my tours are perfectly legal, It against the law to be on the site,but It's perfectly legal to be on the lake!!!" Corpsy said
"He is right, being on the water isn't a crime" Jessica said
"How do you know all this?" Corpsy asked
"I just live near the area" Jessica said nervously
"Well either way, the boy continued looking at he fire while we continued with the tour, a few minutes later he claimed he saw the face of the Crystal Lake Killer" Corpsy said
"Le me guess, Jason Voorhees just jumped onto the boat but put a knife in his head" Tug said
"The kid panicked running around the boat, he slipped on a puddle and split his head open on a metal pole!!, Then his father SUED ME UP HE ASS FOR NEGLIGENCE!! Corpsy yelled
"So Voorhees didn't kill the kid" I guessed
" Jason Voorhees has been dead for years, My our was RUINED because THAT LITTLE COCKSUCKER WAS CARELESS!!" Corpsy yelled again
"Well Not to be impatient But Lets just go in he hose" Chika said as the other kids entered I decided to
13231222111212111122221111.title: Rev. Corpsy

132312221112121111222211112.content:
I stood behind as Corpsy placed a cigarette in his mouth pulling a rusted lighter from his pocket flicking it as the tip burned creating a stream of smoke
"Excuse me, Mr Corpsy?" I asked as he flicked the end off his cigarette placing it back in his mouth
"Yeah kid" The old black man replied blowing a puff of smoke
"Do you work with Robert" I asked as he looked up
"Robert offered the job of tour guise yes, originally I was to be cast as a Groundskeeper but Robbie is a friend of mine" The man said
"You got that Louisianan voodoo doctor look down and you accent is great" I complemented
"I'm Actually from New Orleans, And I did run tours" The old man said
"I Can't wait to see what Robert has planned" I said in partially excitment
"Robert couldn't make it, bad case of the stomach flu" Corpsy said blowing the cigarette
"So what about that test group?" I asked confused
"Beats me, you think of something, my hours up,and I aint getting no overtime" Corpsy said finishing his smoke as he flicked it in the woods walking away
"I should probably get in the others are probably wondering where I... Carl aren't you coming in" Chika asked with the others behind her
"Yeah, I was just Talking to Reverend Corpsy about his tours" I said making an excuse
"Mr Corpsy aren't you coming in?" Tanis asked
"Sorry Kiddo, It's a self-guided tour, you have to figure it all out by yourselves, since it's the first tour admission is free,but make sure you check out Numbskull's den of torture, It's he best part of the tour, of the view of the night sky from the library ceiling window, depends on what you're into" Corpsy said pulling out a flask of whiskey walking into the thick fog as he vanished from sight
"Wait, Numbskull's den of torture, Who is Numbskull?" Jessica asked in an unesy tone
"In the 1960 he murdered the owners of the house, he was apprehended by police but vanished with no trace, they say killed all the men who knew his true identity and destroyed all the evidence, but basically he a psychopath who wears masks made from human bone" Tug Roper replied
"How do you know so much" Jessica asked
"Dude is a local legend,What you thought your town was the only one with a ghost story killer" Grunt added
"So he basically a Sawyer knockoff" Jessica said
"Sawyer?" Grunt said confused
"You know, in the 1970's, there was a family that murdered people and one of them wore a mask of human flesh" Jessica stated
"Damn, now That is scary, well are we gonna check the house out or just stay out here all night?" I asked as we hurried inside
"So what should we do now?" I asked as Sibella replied
"I want to see the torture den" The young vampire replied
"We have all night I think we should see the den last" Tug said as they decided to vote
132312221112121111222211112.title: "It's a Self-Guided Tour"

1323122211121211112222111121.content:
eventually we decided to check out this den of torture, I was eager to see what was planned as we walked down the stairway fallowing the signs as we finally came to the end of of a hallway seeing an old wooden door as I opened it we all looked inside, there were a room full with junk, the only thing interesting was a metal bench, with leather straps hanging which would hold a body a place, there also was a bucket full of tools, drill, scissor, small blades, these probably used for torture purposes" I said as Jessica picked up a knife
"Weird The young zombie said examining the piece
"Weird how" Winnie asked picking up another piece, a corkscrew with a wooden handle
"These tools are all rusted" Jessica said in interest
"Well this house is old" Winnie in defense seeing no confusion
"But there's no moisture in here, these tools had to be put in here" Jessica said jamming the knife in the wall as it made a metallic noise creating a small spark as we all looked in awe
"What just happened" Baxter said as Jessica held the blade up mutilating the wallpaper as we all stood in shock
"Jess, I don't think we should vandalize the place" I said trying to stop her as she put her hand in the holes she made pulling a section of wall out revealing a metal door
"What the hell" Grunt said putting his hand on the door handle pulling as the metal door wouldn't budge
"It's stuck Grunt said as Elsa put her hand on the handle tearing the door of it's hinges
"We already tore a wall apart I guess it's okay to rip a door right off it's hinges" I responded in sarcasm the huge metal door fell on the ground as we entered the room seeing a switch as I flicked it causing a few light bulbs to light up a section of hallway.
"I wonder why this hallway was sealed off Goonie said
"We should check it out" Jessica said
"Whoa, Why are you so eager to check it out" Winnie asked
"I've always found secret passages amazing" Jessica replied
"Really" I added surprised the found enjoyment in something
"Yes, The family camp is full of them,how else do you think my dad moves around undetected" Jessica said
"I think we should tell that Corpsy guy" Tanis said
"Well you go back I'm Checking it out Jessica said walking down the hall out of view as everyone went to tell Corpsy about the hole I decided to
1323122211121211112222111121.title: Hole in The Wall

13231222111212111122221111212.content:
I decided it would be better for me a Jessica to stick together considering it was pretty dark as I followed her
"So Jess, what do you think this hall is for?" I asked as she shrugged
"This Numbskull character probably used it as a hiding spot during his lifetime" I stated my opinion as she suddenly pinned me to the wall with force as i gasped by the surprise
"Jessica what the hell" I gasped as we were string each other in the eyes
You know something don't you" Jessica said letting go
"What do you mean" I replied in defense
"The that you're not from around here and you know so much about the legend" Jessica replied
"Ok fine, you got me It was originally a prank" I admitted
"Originally?" Jessica said confused as i cleared it up
"So this actor who was gonna scare us, got a bad case of he stomach flu" Jessica said in disbelief
"I swear, That Reverend guy was also hired" I told her
"Are you hiding anything" Jessica asked as i insured her i told her everything i know
"I can't believe you" Jessica said
"It was just a prank, you know it wouldn't kill you to have a sense of humor" I replied in defense
"I have a sense of humor" Jessica said in disbelief before admitting I was right
I need to loosen up don't I" Jessica stated in defeat as i nodded
we eventually coming to the end of the hall
"Nothing, not even another doorway, what a wasted cliche" I said as Jessica pinned me to the wall yet again
"What now---" I was cut off as the undead girl surprisingly kissed me as i broke away
"Jessica what the hell" I said in shock wiping my mouth which tasted like sludge as Jessica backed away realizing what she did as she covered her face with her hoodie as she ran down the hall in a sense of shame. I could've fallowed her but I decided to let her be alone, that girl was probly going thru some heavy self dilemma of something like that
13231222111212111122221111212.title: Wasted Cliche

info.brief_description: A boy who applied for Calloway's Military school and got enrolled at Grimwoods by mistake
info.description:
The main purpose of this story is that 5 boys apply to Calloway's military school, 4 of the five get acpeted but one of the application forms got sent to Grimwood's Finishing school for ghouls by mistake, meaning one of the boys will be spending the entire year with a bunch of monsters
List of Cast

Main Character (remaining boys will be new Calloway enrollments)
A.Stanley Helsing: (age 16) A young music lover who plays in 'Laser Maiden' (a garage band)
B.Boner Litch: (age 13) A young writer who is searching for a idea for a story
C.Carl Bronson: (age 11) Wild rock and roll party-boy who follows his own rules and uses nickname 'Velvet Elvis'
D.Fredrick Craven: (age 12) A Young movie critic who dream of going to Hollywood
E.Wayne Myers: (age 9) A kid who dreams of being on TV

Calloway students
Tug Roper: (age 15) leader of the group and sees himself responsible for everything, always getting on the Col. Calloway's good side
Grunt Richards: (age 17) muscle of the group very strong and takes wrestling class during summer
Jamal Williams: (age 14) most athletic member of the group and dreams of being a basketball star
Miguel Brown : (age 10) most clever member of the group most likely to come to come up with an elaborate plan
Baxter Kramer: (age 8) most artistic of the group dreams of going to art school

Grimwood students
Sibella: Daughter of Count Dracula(age 14) most strongwilled and friendly
Phantasma: Daughter of the Phantom of the Opera(age 12) musically talented and play organ and has a qwerky personality
Elsa: Daughter of Frankinstein's Monster(age 16)Mentally slow but kind hearted
Winnie: Daughter of the Wolfman (Werewolf)(age 9) enegetic,tomboyish and likes sports and howling
Tanis: Daughter of the Mummy(age 6) youngest of the girls,shy but friendly
New enrollments
Goonie: Daughter of the Creature of the Black lagoon (age 8) very interesting in nature and everything deemed 'retro'
Godzina: Daughter of Godzilla (age 11) the biggest girl who loves to cook and loves Japanese art
Mary : Daughter of a Martian( age 7) the smartest of the girls but need a device to talk to earth beings
Jessica: Daughter of Jason Voorhees(age 13) very skilled in the woods, keeps to herself
Chika: Daughter of a Chupacabra (age 10) kind-herated also able to speak spanish, best friends with Winnie
